title: Interpol Elevates Scam-Compound Network to Global Threat as Crypto Fraud Spreads
contentSnippet: The aim is to confront global scam center systems that traffic workers, run large-scale online fraud, and channel billions through crypto.

title: Balancer DAO Starts Discussing $8M Recovery Plan After $110M Exploit Cut TVL by Two-Thirds
contentSnippet: The recovered tokens, spanning multiple networks and assets, will be paid out in the same tokens as originally provided, with a claim mechanism being developed.

title: Toncoin Lags Broader Crypto Rebound as Derivatives Data Shows Cautious Optimism
contentSnippet: Altcoin funding rates, including for TON, have turned positive, indicating renewed confidence among traders, but overall market participation remains muted.

title: Trump Family-Linked Alt5 Sigma Ousts Top Execs After CEO Suspension Shakes Up Leadership
contentSnippet: The company is on its third CEO in six weeks, with Tony Isaac appointed as Acting CEO, and has named Steven Plumb as its new CFO.

title: Malware Chrome Extension Secretly Siphoned Fees From Solana Traders for Months
contentSnippet: Cybersecurity firm Socket warns the extension masks a second transaction instruction that quietly skims SOL from routine swaps.

title: Vitalik Buterin Donates $765K in Ethereum to Privacy Messaging Apps
contentSnippet: Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin supported two privacy messaging apps that are looking to break past sector leaders Signal and Telegram.

title: US AI and Data Firms to Testify in Chinese AI Espionage Probe
contentSnippet: The U.S. is probing how Chinese operators used AI in a cyber-espionage campaign as experts warn similar tools could hit on-chain finance.

title: Avalanche ETF Race Heats Up as Bitwise Becomes First to Add Staking
contentSnippet: Bitwise moves its Avalanche ETF closer to market with updated SEC filing and becomes first issuer to include staking.

title: Kalshi doubles valuation in weeks amid prediction market duopoly bet with Polymarket
contentSnippet: Prediction markets have quickly become one of the hottest private market themes in crypto and fintech, echoing earlier cycles.

title: The Daily: Upbit suffers $37 million hack, SpaceX moves over $100 million in bitcoin, Infinex plans token sale on Sonar, and more
contentSnippet: The following article is adapted from The Block’s newsletter, The Daily, which comes out on weekday afternoons.

title: Crypto Holiday Gift Guide 2025
contentSnippet: At a loss for what to buy the crypto fan in your life this festive season? Look no further than Decrypt’s holiday gift guide.

title: Hash Ribbon Flashes Signal That Often Marks Cyclical Bottoms for Bitcoin Price
contentSnippet: A historically reliable bottom signal appears after bitcoin’s 35% correction.

title: Crypto for Advisors: Crypto’s Role in Portfolios
contentSnippet: Crypto's role in diversified portfolios: managing volatility, setting clear mandates, risk discipline, and the case for active investing and broader diversification.

title: UK Proposes ‘No Gain, No Loss’ Tax Rule for DeFi in 'Major Win' for Users
contentSnippet: The proposal, with input from major industry players, aims to bring tax rules in line with how DeFi works, reducing outcomes that don't reflect reality.

title: Spot Solana ETFs Post First Red Day Since Launch
contentSnippet: Solana ETFs recorded their first-ever outflow of $8.1M amid a broader crypto market recovery, breaking a three-week streak of inflows.

title: Justin Sun Doubles Down on First Digital Trust Fraud Allegations, Urges H.K. Regulators to Act
contentSnippet: Sun accused FDT of exploiting gaps in Hong Kong’s trust company regime and urged regulators to act after a Dubai court froze assets linked to the alleged misappropriation.

title: Bitcoin Whales Return to Buying for the First Time Since August as Price Recovers Above $90K
contentSnippet: Large holders return to buying after months of distribution, signalling renewed confidence at key support levels.

title: Bonk Teams Up With Bitcoin Capital to Launch ETP in Europe
contentSnippet: Investors can now trade Solana meme coin BONK as a regulated product on Switzerland's largest stock exchange.

title: Inside Infinex: Kain Warwick on building a ‘superapp’ to solve crypto’s UX problems
contentSnippet: Infinex founder Kain Warwick joined The Big Brain Podcast to discuss tackling crypto's UX problems, fundraising, Crypto Twitter dynamics, and building a "superapp."

title: Kain Warwick’s Infinex builds on $67.7 million Patron NFT round with Sonar sale ahead of INX’s 2026 TGE
contentSnippet: Infinex has unveiled its Sonar token sale ahead of a January Token Generation Event, expanding access to INX beyond its $67.7 million Patron NFT sale.

title: BNB Holds Below $900 Level as Onchain Activity Slumps, Network Updrages Loom
contentSnippet: Price action remains stable, consolidating below $900, amid tension between weak fundamentals and upcoming upgrades.

title: Ethereum raises block gas limit to 60M as ecosystem throughput hits new records ahead of Fusaka upgrade
contentSnippet: Ethereum increased its block gas limit to 60 million after securing majority validator support days before the Fusaka upgrade.

title: ‘A rainy island with a hostile tax system is a hard sell’: Crypto industry reacts to UK Chancellor’s budget statement
contentSnippet: Crypto industry figures welcomed pro-entrepreneur measures but warned that wider tax and regulatory pressures could hurt UK competitiveness.

title: 'Improving Risk Sentiment' Driving Bitcoin's $90K Retest: QCP
contentSnippet: Analysts remain cautiously optimistic, with Bitcoin reclaiming $90K as the chances of a December rate cut hit 85%.

title: Australia moves to fold crypto platforms into financial licensing regime
contentSnippet: Australia's Treasury submitted a new bill to parliament on Wednesday, seeking to require financial licenses for certain crypto platforms.

title: Ark Invest loads up on Coinbase as Cathie Wood predicts ‘real break’ in inflation
contentSnippet: Cathie Wood forecasted that the current liquidity squeeze will reverse in the near term, and said inflation may end next year.

title: South Korea’s Upbit Reports $36 Million Loss in Solana Hot-Wallet Breach
contentSnippet: South Korea’s largest crypto exchange halted services and shifted assets to cold storage after detecting unauthorized withdrawals.

title: Australia Moves to Regulate Crypto Platforms Under New Consumer-Protection Law
contentSnippet: The new framework subjects exchanges and custody providers to financial services laws with ASIC as the primary regulator.

title: Naver and Upbit to pour $7 billion into AI, blockchain following mega-merger: reports
contentSnippet: Naver and Upbit plan to build a financial infrastructure that builds on top of AI and blockchain, according to multiple local reports.

title: Upbit suffers $37 million hack on Solana assets, halts withdrawals
contentSnippet: Upbit identified 540 billion won worth of abnormal withdrawal of various assets on the Solana network from the platform.

title: Conor McGregor calls out Khabib over NFTs, gets shut down by ZachXBT
contentSnippet: The former UFC champion tried to launch his own celebrity memecoin, REAL, in April, but the project failed to gain traction.

title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day
contentSnippet: Both memecoins and NFTs have plunged to their weakest levels since early 2025, with traders pulling back from speculative assets across the board.

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment turned sharply bearish as crypto’s fear index plunged to 28, and $230 billion in value evaporated in a single day.

title: NFT markets rebound after $1.2B wipeout in Friday’s crypto crash
contentSnippet: Top Ethereum NFT collections like BAYC, Pudgy Penguins and CryptoPunks remain in the red despite a partial market recovery after Friday’s crypto market crash.
